Name: Void Arena
About the game: Void Arena is a Fantasy FPS which features an elegant ARPG combat system in the place of gunplay. Skills and classes traditionally played from the isometric perspective are thrilling to experience in first person. Wield magic and steel against your enemies in single and multiplayer action. INFINITE RIFT Endless Wave Mode Defeat endless waves and unlock power ups as you explore hand crafted maps Gain new skills & level up characters STORY MODE (not yet available) Single Player and COOP adventure mode 4 Act Story Gain new skills & level up characters ARENA Free for all & Team Multiplayer Game modes include: Kill the Man with the Ball, Capture the point, Deathmatch Gain new skills & level up characters Void Arena is a passion project of a single developer who sometimes gets help from friends. If you decide to purchase the game please provide as much feedback as you can via the forums. Wishlists help as well! =)
